alliance_deck.description: While the Atreides are your ally, they may assist you by forcing your opponent to show them one element of their Battle plan.

While the Fremen are your ally, they may decide to protect (or not protect) you from being devoured by worms and, at their discretion, may also allow you to revive 3 forces for free during revival. In addition, if the Fremen win with the Frement Special Victory Condition, you also win.

While the Spacing Guild is your ally, you may ship from your off-planet reserves onto Dune or cross-ship from one territory to another with forces that are already on Dune at the Spacing Guild half-price rate. If the Spacing Guild wins with the Spacing Guild Special Victory Condition, you also win.
While the Bene Gesserit are your ally, they may Voice your opponent.
While the Harkonnen are your ally, Traitor Cards they hold may be used against your opponent if they so choose.

While the Emperor is your ally, he may share his great wealth with you by paying spice (directly to the Spice Bank) for the revival of up to 3 extra of your forces (for a possible total of 6 during each revival phase) from the Tleilaxu Tanks.
